title: Jar And Cover, ca. 1928
medium: Blown clear glass, cut and engraved
signed: Engraved in medallion top center of lid:  WVE [and logo] in circular cartouche
dimensions: jar (a) & cover (b): 5.5h x 8.7 diameter cm (2 3/16 x 3 7/16 in.)
description: Flattened circular shape, sides ribbed, lid fits snugly over base;engraved  in circular medallion on top of lid is a stylized dog.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jar And Cover, ca. 1928.
ca. 1928. Blown clear glass, cut and engraved. Gift of Torsten Bröhan. 2001-20-3-a,b.
